name: ALOpsAppCompiler
description: Compile AL Extensions for Business Central
author: Hodor
helpMarkDown: Compile a Business Central extension from AL code.

inputs.name: usedocker
inputs.label: In Docker
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run task in Docker container. $(usedocker) $(usedocker) $(usedocker)

inputs.name: fixed_tag
inputs.label: Fixed Container Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allows recycling of docker containers. $(fixed_tag) $(fixed_tag) $(fixed_tag)

inputs.name: targetproject
inputs.label: Target Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the project to compile. Must be a fully qualified path or relative to $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory). $(targetproject) $(targetproject) $(targetproject)

inputs.name: nav_computername
inputs.label: Computer Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target Business Central Server running service tier. $(nav_computername) $(nav_computername) $(nav_computername)

inputs.name: nav_serverinstance
inputs.label: Server Instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Business Central Server Instance Name. $(nav_serverinstance) $(nav_serverinstance) $(nav_serverinstance)

inputs.name: nav_tenant
inputs.label: NAV Tenant
inputs.helpMarkDown: NAV Tenant used for symbols and compiling the app. $(nav_tenant) $(nav_tenant) $(nav_tenant)

inputs.name: nav_ports_dev
inputs.label: NAV Dev-Port
inputs.helpMarkDown: NAV Port used for DEV-Service. $(nav_ports_dev) $(nav_ports_dev) $(nav_ports_dev)

inputs.name: bc_username
inputs.label: BC Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: BC Username for ServiceTier connection. $(bc_username) $(bc_username) $(bc_username)

inputs.name: bc_password
inputs.label: BC Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: BC User Password for ServiceTier connection. $(bc_password) $(bc_password) $(bc_password)

inputs.name: al_compiler_version
inputs.label: AL Compiler
inputs.helpMarkDown: AL Compiler version used for compiling. $(al_compiler_version) $(al_compiler_version) $(al_compiler_version)

inputs.name: ruleset
inputs.label: Force Ruleset
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrule the Ruleset from VSCode settings. Path relative to [alsourcepath] $(ruleset) $(ruleset) $(ruleset)

inputs.name: suppresswarnings
inputs.label: suppress Warnings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrule the 'suppresswarnings' setting. $(suppresswarnings) $(suppresswarnings) $(suppresswarnings)

inputs.name: al_analyzer
inputs.label: AL Analyzer
inputs.helpMarkDown: AL Analyzer(s) used for compiling. (Example: CodeCop,UICop) $(al_analyzer) $(al_analyzer) $(al_analyzer)

inputs.name: ignorepragmas
inputs.label: Ignore Pragmas
inputs.helpMarkDown: Report Suppressed Diagnostics: diagnostics suppressed in source code should be emitted. $(ignorepragmas) $(ignorepragmas) $(ignorepragmas)

inputs.name: nav_app_version
inputs.label: App Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Template for versioning NAV-Apps. '*' is replaced by the current Build Number. $(nav_app_version) $(nav_app_version) $(nav_app_version)

inputs.name: vsix_download_path
inputs.label: VSIX Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alternative VSIX download url. 'Latest' can be specified. $(vsix_download_path) $(vsix_download_path) $(vsix_download_path)

inputs.name: use_ssl
inputs.label: Use SSL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use SSL for Business Central connections. $(use_ssl) $(use_ssl) $(use_ssl)

inputs.name: download_test_symbols
inputs.label: Download Test Symbols
inputs.helpMarkDown: Download Test Symbols explicitly (without Test-Version reference in App.json). $(download_test_symbols) $(download_test_symbols) $(download_test_symbols)

inputs.name: usecompression
inputs.label: Compress Source File for Transfer
inputs.helpMarkDown: Compress Source-Folder for transfer to docker container. $(usecompression) $(usecompression) $(usecompression)

inputs.name: publish_artifact
inputs.label: Publish Artifact
inputs.helpMarkDown: Publish generated App Artifact to DevOps. $(publish_artifact) $(publish_artifact) $(publish_artifact)

inputs.name: publishxlif
inputs.label: Publish XLIF
inputs.helpMarkDown: Publish generated XLIF to DevOps. $(publishxlif) $(publishxlif) $(publishxlif)

inputs.name: failed_on_warnings
inputs.label: Fail on Warnings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail task when any warning occurs. $(failed_on_warnings) $(failed_on_warnings) $(failed_on_warnings)

inputs.name: app_file_suffix
inputs.label: Suffix for App filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set a suffix tag on the compiled App filename. $(app_file_suffix) $(app_file_suffix) $(app_file_suffix)

inputs.name: updatebuildnumber
inputs.label: Update Build Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the Build number with the current version. $(updatebuildnumber) $(updatebuildnumber) $(updatebuildnumber)

inputs.name: setup_working_folder
inputs.label: Setup Working Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Copy working folder to Docker container. $(setup_working_folder) $(setup_working_folder) $(setup_working_folder)

inputs.name: showmycode
inputs.label: Show My Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrule ShowMyCode by setting other option than 'Keep'. $(showmycode) $(showmycode) $(showmycode)

inputs.name: resourceexposurepolicy_allowdebugging
inputs.label: Allow Debugging
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrule allowDebugging by setting other option than 'Keep'. $(resourceexposurepolicy_allowdebugging) $(resourceexposurepolicy_allowdebugging) $(resourceexposurepolicy_allowdebugging)

inputs.name: resourceexposurepolicy_allowdownloadingsource
inputs.label: Allow Downloading Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrule allowDownloadingSource by setting other option than 'Keep'. $(resourceexposurepolicy_allowdownloadingsource) $(resourceexposurepolicy_allowdownloadingsource) $(resourceexposurepolicy_allowdownloadingsource)

inputs.name: resourceexposurepolicy_includesourceinsymbolfile
inputs.label: Include Source In SymbolFile
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrule includeSourceInSymbolFile by setting other option than 'Keep'. $(resourceexposurepolicy_includesourceinsymbolfile) $(resourceexposurepolicy_includesourceinsymbolfile) $(resourceexposurepolicy_includesourceinsymbolfile)

inputs.name: internalsvisibleto
inputs.label: Internals Visible To
inputs.helpMarkDown: Remove internalsVisibleTo by setting other option than 'Keep'. $(internalsvisibleto) $(internalsvisibleto) $(internalsvisibleto)

inputs.name: preprocessorsymbols
inputs.label: PreProcessorSymbols
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overwrite the preprocessorSymbols in app.json, comma seperated string. Set to 'NONE' to remove. $(preprocessorsymbols) $(preprocessorsymbols) $(preprocessorsymbols)

inputs.name: applicationinsightskey
inputs.label: ApplicationInsightsKey
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overwrite the ApplicationInsightsKey in app.json. Set to 'NONE' to remove InsightsKey. $(applicationinsightskey) $(applicationinsightskey) $(applicationinsightskey)

inputs.name: printappmanifest
inputs.label: Print App.json
inputs.helpMarkDown: Print the final app.json before compile. $(printappmanifest) $(printappmanifest) $(printappmanifest)

inputs.name: output_alc_logs
inputs.label: Output ALC logs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Output ALC logs. $(output_alc_logs) $(output_alc_logs) $(output_alc_logs)

inputs.name: additionalprobingpaths
inputs.label: Additional Probing Paths
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add additional Assembly probing Paths. $(additionalprobingpaths) $(additionalprobingpaths) $(additionalprobingpaths)
